TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, video games caracter but you went corrupted by abusive use of action replay and hexadecimal editing removing all the meaning intended in thoose 9 lives.

I wish VHS & audio tape to still attract people with some magnetic magic

Granted. You now control the entire world (what? how did magnetic magic do this?). However, another wizard of magnets uses a railgun to kill you.

I wish for foxfire. (don't give me firefox)

Granted! you get a burning fox and you die.

I wish for mor lulz on the world.

Granted. The atmosphere is replaced with nitrous oxide and we all smother while laughing hysterically.

I wish for more cookies. Chocolate chip cookies.

You receive those cookies. However, those cookies are the only food you may ever again eat.

I wish for the ability to make trees grow rapidly wherever I want them to grow, even on surfaces normally not suitable for tree growth.

Granted. You are now worshipped as a god of plants. Somebody gets jealous and stabs you in the face using the critical hit, * 100 damage Facestabbing butterfly knife. Anarchy ensues.

I wish for a facestabbing butterfly knife.

granted, you try to do the knife thing from Aliens and it stabs you in the face after cutting off your hand

i wish that humanity had evolved into energy beings right now

Edited June 30, 2014 by Helix935
ninja'd

Granted. Matter is a form of energy, and humans are already made of matter.

I wish for a pet Scott Manley.

Granted, but you get jealous when you realize that your pet knows orbital mechanics better than you so you give him away.

I wish for a job at the Kerbal Space Center.

Granted. A thousand and one mysterious forces (players) that have possessed every probe core and kerbal for all eternity decide to crush your free will. Literally, by launching green savages out of the sky as well as asteroids, nuclear rocket engines, and lasers.

I wish for the gift of humanity.

Edited June 30, 2014 by Tery215

Granted, but the initiation ceremony for becoming a man is being smothered in Napalm and being lit on fire. Because they can.

I wish I could live in Germany.

Granted. There is now a sinkhole that ate your house, and transported it to Germany. Inside miles of rock.

I wish bombs of hundreds of megatons of TNT could be made the size of a pinhead.

Granted, but a truck delivering these bombs had a hole in the trailer floor, and some of these micro-bombs were spilled out near your street. No one could find them because they're so tiny. Better watch out!

I wish for the .24 update.

Granted, you wait a few weeks for it.

I wish for more fanfiction ideas.

Granted, they are all horribly thought out with countless plot holes.

I wish for some Nutella.

Granted. Nutella is lovely.

I wish for winter.

Granted, the next ice age is started abruptly.

I wish for KSP 1.00

Granted, but the labeling guy labels it 0.01, so you don't think it's an update.

I wish I owned an M2 Browning.

Granted, you got an encrypted one and are unable dig it out.

I wich all existing languages and their dictionnaries can't be metaphorically decyphered. (wooohhhhhhoooo xD you must not have fun)

The wish granting genie has no idea what you're talking about, but you get a pat on the back and a free t-shirt anyway.

I wish for ion thrusters.

Granted, you got a MO5 and it's turtles

I wish to never say never again

granted you will explode when you say anything

i will wish it agian since no one granted it last time

i wish to be AN ALL POWERFULL GENIE

Granted. You are a NUCLEAR GENIE with NUCLEAR SUPERPOWERS!

you are confined to a genie pot and transported to a nuclear power plant

I wish I won the KSP.

Edited July 2, 2014 by Tery215

granted, you can no longer play KSP

i wish that i was a god

granted, welcome back aboard the love boat, but damn that song is so annoying

i wish i ll be satan
